title: Moonpig shares soar as subscribers top 1m and AI stickers prove a hit
description: Strong demand for product personalisation and artificial intelligence tech helped buoy the firm's bottom line in recent months, Moonpig said.
content:
Moonpig shares rose sharply on Wednesday after the group posted an upbeat trading update ahead of its annual general meeting.

title: Mark Kelly seeks fund to protect jobs amid AI changes in workforce
description: As artificial intelligence seeps deeper into everyday life, Kelly, D-Arizona, wants policy that eyes its effects on jobs and shared prosperity.
content:
Arizona Sen. Mark Kelly proposed a new tax on AI company revenues to fund worker protection programs.
The "AI Horizon Fund" would support job training and unemployment aid for workers displaced by AI.

title: China tells tech firms to stop buying Nvidia's AI chips, FT reports
description: China's internet regulator has ordered top technology firms to halt purchases of Nvidia artificial intelligence chips and cancel existing orders as part of a broader push to cut reliance on U.S. technology, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.
content:
Shares of the US company were down 1% in premarket trading.

title: China tells tech firms to stop buying all of Nvidia’s AI chips, FT reports
description: China's internet regulator has instructed the nation's biggest technology firms to stop buying all of Nvidia's artificial intelligence chips and terminate their existing orders, the Financial Times reported on Wednesday.
content: Sept 17 (Reuters) - China's internet regulator has instructed the nation's biggest technology firms to stop buying all of Nvidia's (NVDA.O), opens new tab artificial intelligence chips and terminate their existing orders, the Financial Times reported... [375 chars]

title: A Trump boost to Starmer: $42 bn US investments in UK and a tech prosperity deal
description: During US President Donald Trump's state visit to the United Kingdom, the two countries are set to formalise the 'Tech Prosperity Deal' that would see US firms led by Microsoft invest $42 billion in the UK in areas like artificial intelligence (AI), quantum computing, and civil nuclear energy.
content:
US President Donald Trump’s state visit to the United Kingdom is set to be a win-win for both the countries.

title: AI vs Machine Learning vs Deep Learning: Uncover Key Differences
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), and Deep Learning (DL) are often confused but represent different levels of technology. AI is the broad field, ML is a subset that learns from data, and DL is a specialized form of ML using neural networks.

title: Opinion | AI-enhanced nutrition must enhance our agency, not undermine it
description: Artificial intelligence is powering a nutrition revolution in Asia. To ensure public trust, innovation must put consumers at the forefront.
content:

title: Artificial intelligence is not your friend
description: But despite the industry’s bold claims, today’s data-based systems lack the capacity for moral reasoning required to guide real-world decision-making.

title: AI can predict complications from surgery better than doctors
description: A new artificial intelligence model found previously undetected signals in routine heart tests that strongly predict which patients will suffer potentially deadly complications after surgery. The model significantly outperformed risk scores currently relied upon by doctors.

title: Hong Kong's Ambitious Northern Metropolis Plan Boosts AI and Education Futures
description: Amidst pressure to redefine itself, Hong Kong announces plans to expedite the Northern Metropolis project aimed at enhancing artificial intelligence and education sectors. The initiative seeks to bolster economic growth and maintain global competitiveness by creating jobs and housing, and diversifying its industrial strengths.
content: Hong Kong is set to accelerate plans to develop its Northern Metropolis as a key economic hub close to mainland China. The city's leader, John Lee, aims to invigorate its economy with new industries such as artificial intelligence, and education, piv... [800 chars]
